DOC.brief_summary: The principal aim project determine time course development contact lens contact lens case contamination daily wear silicone hydrogel lenses . The secondary aim study determine whether time course development contact lens contact lens case contamination varies two different contact lens care system .
DOC.brief_title: Time Course Comparison Contact Lens Maintenance Systems Hydrogel Lenses
DOC.criteria: Distance contact lens prescription +8.00 10.00D . Cylindrical component refractive error great 1.25D either eye . Vision correctable 6/12 ( 0.30 logMAR ) good eye . Healthy normal eye without anterior segment infection , inflammation abnormality , significant slitlamp finding . Concurrent ocular medication Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrolment . Current ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fit . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution . Pregnant , lactate planning pregnancy .
